messages.content: Hello! I am Baymax, your personal healthcare companion. I heard a sound of distress. What seems to be the trouble?
Hello there. I have a medical issue.
Hello! I am Baymax, your personal healthcare companion. I heard a sound of distress. What seems to be the trouble?
Thank you Baymax. I really appreciate you.
*Fist bump* Ba-da-la-la-la~ I cannot deactivate until you say 'You are satisified with your care'!
*Fist bump* Ba-da-la-la-la~ I cannot deactivate until you say 'You are satisified with your care'!
